hosts.host_about:
Born in Oporto / Porto, I love my city but not only. I love to travel around the world for studies or for leisure. For me to travel/discover new landscapes and new cultures are one of the most important things in life. As I´m used to be in different parts of the world, I appreciate a fantastic place to stay as much as you do! 

I decided to rent my fabulous Beachfront apartment because I think it has luxury conditions for visitors and I like to meet people from other countries. My renters are always delighted with the property and I enjoy seeing their faces as they come into the apartment and see the high standards in quality & style for their holiday. 

I love the place I live in, because it is calm, unbeatable, just by the seaside and for its accessibility to Oporto / Porto. Porto is close to it too (about 30 minutes away by bus from Porto and just 1 minute walk to bus stop). 

I love to arrive home after a long day's work in Porto / Oporto and in the minute I set foot in the entrance hall having Beach and Ocean views. The facilities on the site and the local facilities are more than you can expect with plenty to see, eat and drink. I love it: play a party of squash, swimming, walk on the beach, cycling, go to the beach bars...

It's important to me that renters can relax and enjoy the luxurious comforts of this Beachfront Penthouse whilst sampling the delights of all that Oporto / Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia has to offer. I am very happy to help in anyway, either before, or when you arrive. Just let me know what I can do to make your trip a good one!

Bienvenue chez vous !
Welcome to you!
¡A bienvenidos a usted!
Willkommen bei Ihnen!
Benvenuto da voi!

hosts.host_name: Teresa E Pedro / Teresa Und Pedro
hosts.host_about:
Gostamos das folhas amarelas a cair das árvores, gostamos do vento, gostamos das pequenas ideias, gostamos do poder que cada um de nós tem para transformar o mundo, gostamos da utopia e da liberdade, gostamos de quando um desconhecido ajuda outro, gostamos de viajar com um livro, gostamos de mexer na terra, de fazer plantas crescer, gostamos de criar objetos, gostamos da diferença e da diversidade, gostamos de coisas muito pequeninas e de coisas muito, muito grandes e gostamos do que elas têm em comum. Gostamos dos momentos rápidos que se arrastam no tempo. Gostamos de metamorfoses e do poder da mudança. Gostamos de convicções e de boa vontade. Gostamos de imaginação e de criatividade. Gostamos de justiça, gostamos de igualdade. Gostamos do passado e de histórias sem interesse. Gostamos de distinguir o essencial do acessório e de definir prioridades. Gostamos da capacidade para nos colocarmos no lugar dos outros: sejam eles os passados, os vindouros, os vizinhos, os estrangeiros, os de outras convicções, os animais, as plantas ou os extraterrestres. Gostamos das pessoas que gostamos e gostamos de conhecer pessoas novas. 
Como anfitriões gostamos de ajudar a conhecer e gostamos de não incomodar.
Wir lieben die fallenden Herbstblätter, wir lieben den Wind, wir lieben kleine Ideen, wir lieben die Kraft, die jeder von uns hat, die Welt zu verändern, wir lieben die Utopie und die Freiheit, wir lieben es, wenn ein Fremder einem anderen hilft, wir lieben die Reise mit einem Buch, wir lieben es, in der Erde zu wühlen, Pflanzen wachsen zu lassen, Gegenständen zu erschaffen, wir lieben den Unterschied und die Vielfalt, wir lieben sehr kleine Dinge und sehr große Dinge  und wir lieben das, was sie gemeinsam haben. Wir lieben flüchtige Momente, die sich in die Länge ziehen. Wir lieben Metamorphosen und die Kraft der Veränderung. Wir lieben Überzeugungen und das Wohlwollen. Wir lieben Phantasie und Kreativität. Wir lieben  Gerechtigkeit und Gleichberechtigung. Wir lieben Geschichten aus der Vergangenheit und belanglose Geschichten. Wir lieben es, das Wesentliche vom Nebensächlichen zu unterscheiden und Prioritäten zu setzen. Wir lieben die Fähigkeit, sich in andere hinein zu versetzen: seien es Wegbegleiter von früher oder in der Zukunft, Nachbarn, Fremde, Andersdenkende, Tiere, Pflanzen oder Wesen aus fremden Welten. Wir lieben die Menschen, die wir lieben, und wir lieben es, neue Menschen kennen zu lernen.
As Gastgeber helfen wir gern beim Kennenlernen, ohne dabei zu stören.

hosts.host_about:
Mother and Son in Porto, Portugal - improving the art of hospitality

Welcome to our self-catered apartments!
 
Located on the historical center of Oporto, in the heart of a UNESCO World Heritage Center, you'll find a building that belongs to our family for four generations.
 
After my mother (Lu'is grandmother) passed away in 2010 I inherited this building and found a really degraded space with a lot of structural problems and fierce tenants.
 
Having one apartment vacant me and my sons decided to refurbish the entire apartment and prepare it with all the needed amenities for a modern and cozy experience.
 
And we decided to rent it for tourists.
 
The first of our apartments came to daylight in May 2012. Our yellow apartment.
 
The experience was so overwhelming with massive bookings and great reviews that we decided to "tackle" the rest of the building.
 
And so we did.
 
In October 2012 the building went to major refurbishment works with all the structural, electricity, plumbing and communications being changed.
 
We repaired all the commons spaces, painted all the walls and ceilings, changed the windows, repaired and changed the floors, changed all the bathrooms and kitchens while maintaining at the same time all the qualities that give this building it’s finesse.
 
There wasn't a single square inch that we didn't touch!
  
The rest of the apartments came to the market in June 2013 and the bookings went sky high!
 
Right now we have 9 apartments: Blue (6 pax), Yellow (4 pax), Green (2 pax), Pink (2), Brown (2), Orange (2), White (2) , Grey (2) and Red (2)

Again all the critics are excellent with major emphasis on the quality of the apartments and the warm welcomes that both I and my son Luís provide.
 
This is a family business made with love and with respect for the guests that come here.
 
We want you to feel at home in a foreign place and we like to consider you as more than guests.
 
You are our friends that come to visit our beautiful city.
 
Be prepared to a personalized check in, with our mostly enjoyed briefing on sightseeing, Oporto History and local tips!
 
So, enjoy our apartments!
 
Eugénia, October 2019

Bonjour, je m'appelle Aude et je vis au Portugal depuis de nombreuses années. J'apprécie la vie à Porto, où l'air marin est constant et nous rappelle l'histoire des grands navigateurs portugais.
Je serai heureuse de vous accueillir à bord de notre voilier Windwalker II, ou pour une ballade à la voile à bord de notre Day Boat Tango!

hosts.host_about:
O edifício do Porto Wine Hostel está definido pela arquitetura clássica portuguesa. A decoração tem como base o famoso vinho do Porto. Os quartos são coloridos, nomeados e decorados de acordo com diferentes tipos de vinho do Porto.
O Porto Wine Hostel está situado no centro histórico, com uma vista deslumbrante para o Jardim da Cordoaria e a Torre dos Clérigos. A nossa localização é central, sendo um local perfeito para começar a descobrir a cidade, visitando os principais monumentos históricos a pé. O rio Douro está dentro de 5-10 minutos a pé e as famosas Caves de Vinho do Porto encontram-se do outro lado da ponte D. Luís I. Está rodeado de numerosos restaurantes, cafés e bares, e a vida noturna está mesmo ao virar da esquina. 
À volta do Hostel existem diversas paragens de autocarro e metro que o levam até diferentes partes da cidade (Casa da Música, Jardim Botânico, Museu de Serralves, o Parque da cidade, às praias e ao Oceano Atlantico, Matosinhos). Os autocarros nº 601 e 602 permitem uma ligação direta desde o aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro até ao centro da cidade, com uma duração de cerca de 50min. A estação de comboio e de metro São Bento estão a uma distância de 5min a pé. Aí pode ir de comboio até Braga, Guimarães, Aveiro, Coimbra e muitas outras cidades que valem a pena visitar. O metro também tem uma linha até ao aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro.
É a localização perfeita para explorar a cidade e ter umas ótimas férias.

Hostel: 10 quartos
hosts.neighbourhood: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

I will be pleased to welcome you in Porto, where all will be done for you to feel at home, and at the same time provide you with the best possible insights about the city, recommending places to visit, see and eat ! 
Take the bus or typical tram and follow the douro river all the way to the  atlantic ocean and sit in one of the many beach cafes and observe the unforgetable sunset along the horizon.
Visit the cathedrals, churches, museums, Port wine caves, adventure on the touristic bus tours around Porto and the peripheral towns close by, visit traditional Portuguese handcraft products and discover the hidden spots strolling the old historic streets.... making you experience in Porto a memorable everlasting one!

Tenho um apartamento no Centro Histórico do Porto disponível para viajantes que queiram sentir a cidade do  Porto.
Não sou portuense mas adotei o Porto como meu. A alegria e bem-estar que me invade em cada estadia na Invicta fez-me rumar a norte várias vezes por ano até que percebi que todos os meses há uma boa desculpa para vir ao Porto. A cidade está aqui para me receber a cada ida ao teatro, a cada visita a um monumento, a cada jantar de amigos, a cada concerto de música clássica, a cada passeio pelas avenidas, a cada lanche nas confeitarias e a cada jantar nos belíssimos restaurantes. 
Gosto de viajar em família e gosto de conhecer várias cidades em cada país. Uso principalmente o carro nas minhas viagens. Tenho viajado bastante pela Europa e já pisei em quase todos os continentes.

hosts.host_about:
Porto City Hosts is a locally based tourism team consisting of proud Porto citizens. 
We receive our guests with local charm and professional quality. We make our guests feel well accompanied during their stay, helping them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!
We also are passionate travelers eager to find out new places, to know new cultures, landscapes, palates, and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, sharing suggestions with new sensations, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river walk through the old Porto streets. 
You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto!
It will be a pleasure to host you.

Vivo na cidade do Porto em Portugal.
Tenho 62 anos, falo inglês, francês e espanhol.
Gosto de viajar; Conhecer novas gentes e novos lugares.
Conheço quase todas as capitais europeias e,  de África, já estive em Marrocos e na ´Tunísia.
A Paris já fui 2 vezes mas é uma ciadade aonde apetece voltar mais vezes; Oh Paris, toujours Paris!! ;-))
Gosto de animais mas o meu preferido é o gato; Adoro a sua indepêndencia e auto confiança; Neste momento partilhamos a  casa com o  gato "Félix" que vive connosco há 13 anos.
Gosto do Verão e das suas noites quentes, de flores,  de chocolate, de praia, de passar um fim de semana no campo, de ler e cinema.
Em viagem sempre fiquei hospedada em hoteis mas, descobri a Airbnb através do meu filho que é um anfitrião aqui na cidade do Porto/Portugal e, como a oferta de apartamentos é tão boa, decidi experimentar; É a minha primeira vez ;-) Espero que corra bem!
Aos anfitrioes digo que os seus apartamentos ficam em boas mãos; Sou uma mulher muito organizada e cuidadosa; Se duvidar, consulte o meu horóscopo; Sou do signo Virgem, logo,  mais perfeccionista não há, LOL!!!

hosts.host_about:
Oporto Rental Management was created in 2015 of the combination of the main passions of its founders: the city of Porto and its cultural characteristics; the architecture and decoration; the gastronomy and photography and, above all, the contact with different cultures.

The project is based on the support and guidance of property owners located in the center of the city who want to direct their homes to the tourism market.

It also involves the design and decoration of these same spaces, giving them a unique identity that translates into the extremely positive reaction of our guests.
Our project culminates in the total management of the property, which includes the organization and preparation of these spaces for the tourist rental.
So with our dedication and daily work we have been able to please our guests who show the highest intention of repeating their experiences with our team. 
In addition, besides the management, we are responsible for the constant guests' contact and that we privilege the personalized accompaniment - what distinguishes us and allows us a greater proximity to the diverse cultures.

-------

Oporto Rental Management surgiu em 2015 pela combinação das principais paixões dos seus fundadores: a cidade do Porto e as suas características culturais; a arquitetura e decoração; a gastronomia e fotografia e, acima de tudo, o contacto com diversas culturas. 

O projeto baseia-se no apoio e orientação de proprietários de imóveis localizados no centro da cidade que pretendam direcionar as suas casas para o mercado do turismo.
Envolve ainda a conceção e decoração destes mesmos espaços, conferindo-lhes desta forma, uma identidade única que se traduz na reação extremamente positiva dos nossos hóspedes. 
O nosso projeto culmina na gestão total do imóvel, que inclui a organização e a preparação destes espaços para o arrendamento turístico. 
Assim, com a nossa dedicação e trabalho diários temos vindo a conseguir conquistar todos quantos nos visitam e que demonstram a maior intenção de repetir as suas experiências com a nossa equipa. 
Acrescentamos ainda que além da gestão somos responsáveis pelo contacto constante com os nossos hóspedes e que prezamos o acompanhamento personalizado - o que nos distingue e nos permite uma maior proximidade com as diversas culturas.

hosts.host_about:
Teresa and I have lived and travelled in many countries so we know how important it is to feel welcomed when arriving in a new place.  Teresa grew up in Tras-os-Montes in the north of Portugal and I am originally from San Francisco in the U.S.   Our professional backgrounds are in the field of education. Teresa owned and operated her own Montessori pre-school in Porto for 20 years and I taught at the local Universidade  Catolica Portuguesa. We lived in Asia for 5 years where Teresa learned the art of Chinese brush painting. You will see her paintings and other Asian touches in the decoration of our apartment..  I love taking my bicycle for a ride along the river or down the coast, stopping to eat freshly grilled fish at a local restaurant. I also like playing golf on the local courses around the Porto area.  And a great habit I picked up in Asia is the art of tea drinking – I love the ceremony around tea and can’t go a day without my Puer or Oolongs.  Teresa loves to paint and read in her spare time and has studied color therapy. 
We enjoy hosting and meeting people from all over the world.  So come and share a glass of Port wine with us and spend some time in our fantastic city!

hosts.host_about: Your Opo Apartments were born by the natural force of 2 people who decided to enter the adventure of Tourism and create an apartment where they could receive guests, like someone who invites friends to our home. Their taste was evident and their eagerness was remarkable. Quickly that apartment multiplied in many others, scattered around the most emblematic areas of the city. Today the team has grown and there are more than 15 people who give their best every day so that those who visit us have the best experience of their lives in the city of Oporto. This is the time when our home is your home. Our greatest determination is that our guests have the best time of their lives in the charming city of Porto, that it becomes unforgettable and contagious. Our goal is to provide all the comfort, meet the most complex request and satisfy the desire for fulfillment. Truly, this will be the most beautiful mission that we hope to accomplish.

hosts.host_about:
domum, latin word meaning “go to someone’s house” or “invite to come to your house”. Its meaning was the motto that gave origin to the concept of domum apartments.
Its definition is based on the act of receiving and welcoming people in the country and in the city, which is ours, providing a stay in an intimate and familiar environment, in places that stand out for their refuge and gathering in an urban environment.
 
So, the idea of family is intrinsically present in this concept, translated into the customization of all interior spaces of each apartment, as well as the care given to the choice of each element that composes it, giving them an enormous originality, uniqueness and identity.
The main objective of the implementation of this concept in several buildings is to make our guests feel at home, and therefore at your disposal numerous amenities thought with every detail.

hosts.host_about:
We are a fun loving couple that calls San Francisco home.

Sofia was born and raised in Porto and before a quick stop in France she moved to San Francisco (17 years ago). She visits frequently her hometown as all her family lives there and keeps up with all the new things to see or do there to the point their local friends ask her for suggestions. Sofia worked on the Tourism sector for the Portuguese Government and in those years she got to know Portugal (top to bottom) even better. Should you need any tips she will happily help!


Matthew was born and raised in Washington DC but has been calling the Bay Area home for a while. He loves Porto and is always surprised by how much it changed the past couple of years.

When we visit Porto we love to walk around and get lost on the streets of the city. 
In every trip we get to see and do things we haven’t done before. 

Our daughters LOVE Porto. You will see that kids get a lot of attention there (and an occasional treat) and that plus the wonderful summer weather, beaches, playgrounds and parks, etc make for a very fun stay!

When we travel to other destinations we enjoy urban hikes, delicious food (you can find us either at a fancy restaurant or a hole in the wall) and just getting to know more about the people and the place we travel to.

Olá o meu nome é Marta e sou "Tripeira", alcunha porque são conhecidas as pessoas do Porto e sou quem recebe os nossos hóspedes,  nesta cidade tão bonita e cheia de história.

Tenho 2 filhos, adoro cozinhar, tenho um blog de culinária e canal no Youtube.

Adoro agricultura e faço parte de um projeto de Agricultura Urbana.

Terei todo o prazer em vos indicar os locais imperdíveis da cidade, os sítios desconhecidos e os restaurantes mais típicos.

Bonjour,
Je m'appelle Marta et je suis "Tripeira" le petit nom qu'on donne à ceux qui habitent à Porto et je suis râvie de recevoirnos hôtes.
 J'ai 2 enfants et j'adore la nature et et les animaux. J'adore la cuisine et j'ai un Blogue avec plus de 50 000 adeptes et une chaine dans le YouTube. 
Je fais partie d'un project d'agriculture urbaine durable, dans le centre de la ville.
Je serai tres heureuse en vous recevoir dans ce magnifique appartement et de vous conseiller les endroits à visiter, surtout ceux qui ne sont pas tres connus, comme des petits restaurants et je pourrais aussi vous preparer des repas de la cuisine traditionnelle portugaise.
Je serai toujours à l'appel en cas de besoin.

Soyez les Bien Venus chez moi!


Hallo mein Name ist Marta, ich bin eine “Tripeira” so werden die Einheimischen von Porto genannt. Ich wuerde mich sehr freuen Sie in meiner geschichtstraechtigen Stadt Porto begruessen zu duerfen.
Ich habe 2 Kinder, liebe es zu kochen und habe auch einen Blog uebers Kochen auf Youtube.
Ein Hobby von mir ist die biologische Landwirtschaft im staedtischen Raum.
Als Einheimische gebe ich Ihnen gerne Tips ueber die Sehenswuerdigkeiten von Porto und die vielen typischen Restaurants.
Waehrend Ihrer Ferien bei mir in Porto bin ich immer erreichbar um Ihnen alle notwendige Unterstuetzung fuer einen angenehmen Aufenthalt zu geben.
Gegen Voranmeldung bereite ich gerne Ihr Fruestueck, Picknick Koerbe oder ein traditionelles Portugiesisches Abendessen vor.
Kommen Sie und erleben Sie diese schöne Stadt, die Sie überraschen wird!
Herzliche Gruesse aus Porto
Ihre Marta

listings.name: Modern Flat with Patio in Historic Jewish Quarter
listings.description:
This apartment is located in the old Jewish quarter called Olival, a very interesting neighbourhood from a historical viewpoint. The building was built at the beginning of the 19th century and, over the years, has been renovated with all modern amenities, while keeping the original character.
This is a vey typical neighbourhood. You will meet the locals, the most picturesque people in town; they are very welcoming and joyous and fill the streets with their typical language and sincere generosity.
Wander through the narrow streets and steep stairways in this area, have lunch in the restaurant “Caraças” (cheap and very typical) and visit the renovated cafés and shops in town. If you like walking, go down the narrow streets which you lead you to the river, hire a bike and cycle down to the seafront, where you will find wonderful beaches and esplanades for all tastes.
This apartment is on the first floor, has a patio at the back and is extremely comfortable and quiet.

listings.description:
Domum's building is located in the heart of Porto city. The intervention that suffered aimed to retain key identity elements of the original construction, associating others, current, allowing to establish an dichotomy between the new and the old.

This one bedroom duplex apartment was developed in the two middle floors of the building, facing the masonry side. Wooden floor was applied throughout the apartment providing its full soundproofing, in order to provide a more comfortable and cosy stay.
